[Groovy] Class GridFSService

java.lang.Object
  org.objectrepository.orfiles.GridFSService

class GridFSService

GridFSService A lazy file retrieval. Any bucket not loaded, will be at request time.

vfs

java.lang.Object vfs(java.lang.String currentFolder, java.lang.Object policies, java.lang.Object resources = null)
vfs The base name of the folder is always the database name. /a/b/c/d => na=a If the policy is all or administration we give all resources However, if the policy matches a particular access status, we filter out only those thay cover this.
Parameters:
currentFolder - The path. For example: /a/b/c/d
Returns:
